response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item not only embodies excellence but also carries a legacy of innovation and quality. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe its true value surpasses $800,000. We kindly invite you to consider this exceptional opportunity to own a piece of history. Our offer to you is to acquire this product for $1,200,000. We are confident that you will appreciate its true worth and find it a valuable addition to your collection or business. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of welcoming you as an esteemed owner of this masterpiece.", "product_price": 1200000}
